Package org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.source

Class Summary
AggregatingFallbackSourceFactory  
AggregatingSource  
FallbackSourceFactory Source factory following the fallback principle.
LenyaSourceFactory A factory for the "lenya" scheme (virtual protocol), which is used to resolve any src="lenya:..."
RepositorySource Repository source.
SiteSourceFactory This source factory allows to access documents based on their path in the site structure.
SourceUtil  
TemplateFallbackSourceFactory Source factory following the fallback principle, resolving the existing ancestor of the existing resource.
ZipSource  
ZipSourceFactory Implementation of a Source that gets its content from and ZIP archive.
